documentation.content: This alert triggers when there is a high amount of memory in use. Memory pressure can cause excessive garbage collection, leading to performance degradation.

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch prometheus_target
| { t_0: metric 'prometheus.googleapis.com/kibana_os_mem_bytes_used/gauge'
  ; t_1: metric prometheus.googleapis.com/kibana_os_mem_bytes_total/gauge }
| ratio
| group_by sliding(5m), mean(val())
| condition val() > 0.9
